topics.title: Quadratic Equations
topics.description: Solving quadratic equations by factoring, completing the square, and using the quadratic formula.

topics.title: Exponents and Logarithms
topics.description: Simplifying expressions with exponents, solving exponential equations, and evaluating logarithmic expressions.

topics.title: Systems of Linear Equations
topics.description: Solving systems of linear equations by substitution, elimination, and graphing.

topics.title: Trigonometry
topics.description: Solving problems involving angles, triangles, and trigonometric functions.

topics.title: Polynomial Functions
topics.description: Graphing and solving problems involving polynomial functions.

topics.title: Rational Functions
topics.description: Graphing and solving problems involving rational functions.

topics.title: Probability
topics.description: Calculating probabilities of events and understanding basic concepts such as independence and conditional probability.

topics.title: Sequences and Series
topics.description: Identifying arithmetic and geometric sequences and series, finding their sums, and solving related problems.

topics.title: Conic Sections
topics.description: Identifying and graphing circles, parabolas, ellipses, and hyperbolas.

topics.title: Matrices
topics.description: Defining matrices, performing basic operations, and solving systems of linear equations using matrices.

topics.title: Polar Coordinates
topics.description: Converting between polar and rectangular coordinates, graphing polar equations, and solving related problems.
